plot: Covering Hitler's invasion of Poland, with the world on the brink of war, and features stunning colorized footage of the catastrophe faced by the Polish army as it was crushed by the Nazi war machine.

May 1945. After days of violent fighting, Soviet troops enter into a devastated Berlin. But how did it come to this? 1939. The German and Soviet invasion of Poland crushes the last hopes for a peaceful resolution of political tensions. Great Britain and France have no choice but to declare war on Hitler. Meanwhile, Hitler makes a bold, fearsome plan for the invasion of France.—Anonymous
